266a5(mdo 'grel): spyod yul lo// mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du ni// 'phags pa mi pham pas gsungs te// thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni// zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag/ thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa// de dag rang bzhin 
266a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid can// ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o// byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams spyod yul lo// sgrib pa kun las nges grol ba// stong pa nyid dang ro gcig mchog/ chos rnam 
266a7(mdo 'grel): de dag kun gyi ni// rten du yang dag rab tu brjod// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// khyab bdag stong nyid ro gcig ste// rnam dag stong nyid gcig pa'i bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin dam pa ste/ 
266a8(mdo 'grel): stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas// dngos dang dngos min gcig mtshan nyid// bden pa nyid kyi bdag nyid du// dpal ldan chos sku ston pa'o// gtso bo ye shes tshogs nyid ni// yongs su smin pa mkhab dang 
266b1(mdo 'grel): mtshungs// gtso bo sems gang gsal dag pa// thub pazung 'jug bdag nyid do// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras kyis// chos kyi sku de gsungs pa ste// mngon rtogs rgyan du gsungs pa ni// byang chub phyogs 
266b2(mdo 'grel): mthun tshad med dang // rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni// snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang // zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang // zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni// rab du dbye bas rnam brgyad dang / 
266b3(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dang // mngon shes so so yang dag rig/ rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang // dbang bcu dang ni stobs bdu dang // mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang // bsrung ba med pa rnam 
266b4(mdo 'grel): gsum dang // dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang // bsnyel ba mi mnga'i chos nyid dang // bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang // skye la thugs rje chen po dang // thub pa kho na ri ma 'dres chos// bco brgyad 
266b5(mdo 'grel): bshad pa gang yin dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang // chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin// chos kyi sku'o// theg chen kun gyi rnam pa ni// sdud pa'i chos ni yang dag gsungs// sa bcu dbang phyug rnams
266b6(mdo 'grel): dang ni// de ni bde ba langs spyod nying // thags med zag med khyab pa ste// gsapa zhing 'byung ba'i rdul phran spangs// dbang pa'i gzhu dang nam mkha' yi// skar chags dri ma med pa bzhin// mi lang rnams 
266b7(mdo 'grel): su phan tshun du// de ni gzugs brnyan gzugs brnyan bzhin// sum du gnyis mtshan brgyad du yi// dpe byad rgyan du byas te 'bar// bsod nams tshogs ni gtso bo ru// rnam par smin pa gsung bdag
266b8(mdo 'grel): nyid// ma lus nam mkha' yongs gang zhing // mtha' yas 'od gsal mtha' yas pa// de ltar mngon rtogs rgyan las gsungs// mtshan ni sum du rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgyad du'i bdag nyid 'di// 
267a1(mdo 'grel): thag chen nye bar yangs su pyid// thub pa yangs spyad rdzogs skur ban// sangs spyad rdzogs pa'i drug/ dza m+b+ha dzaH/ 'i gzugs byas ni// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste/ 
267a2(mdo 'grel): sems can bsam pa'i rjes brtags nas// shA thub pa la sogs pa'i// thub pas 'khor ba ma stongs par// kun du mye dang byang chub sogs// bstan nas 'grod na byed pa ste// lus gtsor sprul pa'i 
267a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid de// 'phags pargyal ba byams pas gsungs// gang gis srid pa ji srid par// 'grel phan pa sna tshogs dag/ mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni// thub pa'i sbrul su rkun mi 'chad// sbrul skur// 
267a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang rgyal bas lung bstan pa// 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa// khams gsum spyod pa las grol mas dang yan ma gyur dngos kun zo nyid// dag cing zhi la rnam bden mchog bzhi'i rang 
267a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin rnam 'byor ba nyid yul// rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab ban khyab cing mtshan ma med// rgyal ba'i bden pa mnyam med panam su ma rtag su gcig la phyag 'tshal// spyan tsaH/ 
267a6(mdo 'grel): skyes pa'i sku'o// gang zhig gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan pa na phun tshogs chen po'i gzhir gyur pa// dngos dang dngos med ma yin nas mtha' bzhin du ri mnyam rtog par dka' ba'i rang bzhin 
267a7(mdo 'grel): can/ 'gyur med gas pa med cing ni la mi mnyam mnam pa khyab pa po ste spros med pa// so sor rang rig pa med rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// chos skur// gang zhig 'jig rten las/ 
267a8(mdo 'grel): 'das bsam gyis me khyab legs byas dam pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du// 'byor pas 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs gsal mdzad blo ldan chen po rnams ni dga' ba'i sku// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten kun 
267b1(mdo 'grel): las rab byung rgyun mi 'chad par rgya chen dam chos sgrogs// chos kyi rgyal srid che la rab bzhugs longs spyod rdzogs sku de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// gang zhig sems
267b2(mdo 'grel): can smin pa'i tshod dul lar me bzhin du ni gsal bar snang gyur cing // yang ni la lar rdzogs par byang chub chos 'khor bskor nas slar yang mya ngan 'das gang mthong // rnam pa du mar bzhugs nas srid gsum 
267b3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa sel ba'i thabs su sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcur rjes song don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i skul 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo// sprul pa'i sku'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skul gnas/ 
267b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi yang // spros pa rgya che ba yi phyir// sa so ru ni mngon par brjod// bla ma'i rjes 'gre la sogs pas// phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa'o// mi byed sdom pa blangs pa yis/ 
267b5(mdo 'grel): zhabs ni rab tu legs par gnas// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// yun rings du ni bsten pa yis// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ni// ngang pa bzhin du dra bas 'brel// gya nom pa yi bza' bca' sogs// 
267b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu byin pas phyag zhabs ni// gzhon zhing 'jam ste byis pa ni// skye ma thag pa ji bzhin no// ldag pa la sogs phyin pa yis// phyag zhabs gnyis kyi rgyab dang ni// lhag khung phrag pa gnyis te bdun/ 
267b7(mdo 'grel): mtho ba yi na sku can nyid// bsod pa'i skye bo thar byas pas// lag pa'i sor mo ring banyid// skye 'gro'i mtshol phan btags pas// rtag tu rting pa yangs pa nyid// srog gcod pa ni spangs pa yis// sku tshe shin tu drang / 
267b8(mdo 'grel): ba nyid/ dge chos blangs pa'i gtso bo yis// nabs kyi long bu mi mngon nyid// dge ba blangs te spel ba yis// spuni gyen du phyogs pa nyid// rig dang bzo sogs gus byas te// byin pa e Na'i byin pa nyid/ 
268a1(mdo 'grel): slong la bdog pa'i nor byin pas// phyag ni ring zhing mdzes pa nyid// gsang ba'i tshig ni bsrungs pa dang // 'gro ba tshangs spyod la bskod pas// 'doms kyi smra ba sbubs su ni// nub pa 
268a2(mdo 'grel): nyid du grags pa'o// gding bgya nom pa byin pas// mdog ni gser 'dra ba nyid dang // khang bzangs dam pa byin pa yis// pags pa 'jam nang gser mdog nyid// 'du 'dzil sogs spangs pa yis/ 
268a3(mdo 'grel): sA ni re re nas g.yas dbyil// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad ni// gnas ji lta ba nin bskod pa yis// zhal mdzad spus mtshan drag cig ni// med pas seng ge'i ro snod 'dra// snyan dang rim pa 
268a4(mdo 'grel): legs smras pas// dpung mgo shin du zlum pa nyid// smin la sogs pa rab 'byin pas// thal gong yang dag rgyas pa dang // de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog byas pas// ro ni bro ba'i mchog nyid do// 
268a5(mdo 'grel): nag tshal kun dga' rab sogs// me rnams yang dag byed bcug pas// su yi dkyil 'khor mnyam nyid de// n+ya gro d+ha yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// gtsug lag khang sogs byin pa yis// dbu ni 
268a6(mdo 'grel): gtsug tor ldan pa nyid// 'jam ning snyan pa'i tshig smras pas// ljags ni ring zhing srab pa nid// dam chos legs par go byas pas// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung nyid do// sems can kun la chag 
268a7(mdo 'grel): bkyil pa// spangs pas seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid// sems can kun la legs bkur ba'i// sbyin pa sogs kyis tshems dkar nyid// 'tsho ba dag pa don gnyer bas// tshems ni mnyam pa nyid du brjod// 
268a8(mdo 'grel): bden tshig kun du spyad pa yis// tshems ni thags ni bzang ba nyid// phra ma tshig ni spangs pa yis// tshe mas ni bani bcu tshang ba nyid// sems can kun la mnyam nyid du// bltas pas spyan ni mthon mtho 
268b1(mdo 'grel): nyid// khong khro sogs dang bral ltas pas// rdzi ma pa yi lta bu nyid// gsungs pa 'di dag thub chen gyi// mtshan ni subacu rtsa gnyis so// 'du byed 
268b2(mdo 'grel): kun lam chags pas// thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog nyid// sems can kun la phan bsams pas// sen mo'i mdog ni snum pa nyid// rigs kyi mchog las 'khrungs pa'i phyir// sen po mtho ba 
268b3(mdo 'grel): nyid yin no// tshul ni kha na ma tho ba// med pas sor mo zlum pa nyid// legs par dge ba bsags pa yis// sor mo rnams ni rgyas pa ni// mthar gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis ni// sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid// 
268b4(mdo 'grel): lus sogs las dang 'tsho ba ni// rab bsrungs rtsa mi mngon pa nyid// nyon mongs mdun pa rnam dgrol bas// rtsa yi mdud pa med pa nyid// sems la chos ni sbas pa yis// long bu mi mngon pa nyid do// 
268b5(mdo 'grel): skye bo kun bgrod dka' ba sgral pas// zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid// mi zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis// seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid// klu zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis// 
268b6(mdo 'grel): glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid// mkha' la gshegs mkhas bsod nams kyis// ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid// skyes bu khyu mchog bsod nams kyis// khyu mchog stobs su gshegs pa 
268b7(mdo 'grel): nyed// bskor phyogs lam mthun gshegs pa yis// g.yas su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid// mdzes pa'i dge mkhas nyid kyis ni// yang dag mdzes par gshegs pa nyid// rtag tu gya gyu'i sems med pas// 
268b8(mdo 'grel): mi g.yo bar ni gshegs pa yin// rnam dag yon tan thob pa'i phyir// su ni 'khril bag chags pa nyid// sdig pa'i chos dang ma 'phags pas// sku ni byi dor byas 'dra nyid// 'dul bya kun gyi sems brtags nas// 
269a1(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i chos ni ston pa dang // lus sogs gtsang sbra'i tshul gyis ni// su ni rim par 'tsham pa dang // sku sogs kun spyod gtsang ba'i phyir// sku ni shin tu gtsang ba nyid// thugs ni brtse 
269a2(mdo 'grel): chen gyis brlan phyir// su ni shin tu 'jam pa nyid// thugs ni shin du yongs dag phyir// sku ni rnam par dag pa nyid// chos 'dul ba ni rdzogs pa yis// thub pa'i mtshan ni rdzogs pa nyid// yangs 
269a3(mdo 'grel): mdzes yon tan brjod pa yis// sku yi kho log yangs pa nyid// kun la thugs ni snyoms pa'i phyir// gom pa shin du snyoms pa nyid// rnam dag chos ni yang dag ston// spyan ni shin du yongs dag 
269a4(mdo 'grel): nyi/ gas chos ni sbyin pa'i phyir// shin dru gzhon ga can med dang // thugs ni dag sum nus byer// suni rnam pa med pa ni// dge ba yang dge 'phags pa yis// shin du rgyas shing mtho ba'i \u0f88\u0f90/ 
269a5(mdo 'grel): yang srid pa ni zad pa'i phyir// sku ni shing du grims pa nyid// rten cing 'brel 'byung gsal ston pas// yan lag rnam par byed pa nyid// tshig don shin du rnam dag par// ston pas gzigs pa dag pa// 
269a6(mdo 'grel): nyid// brtul zhugs phun tshogs slob pa ni// bsdus pas sku ni zlum pa nyid// bdud stobs 'joms pas su ma zhom// de bzhin dam pa'i sku nyid do// chos zad pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir// phya la ni phya ba nyid do// / 
269a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu zab pa'i chos ston pas// lte ba zab pa nyid yin no// slob ma mthun par 'dzin pa yis// lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa nyid// thams cad du ni rab mdzes pa'i// 'khor 'byung ba yi chos nyid kyis/ 
269a8(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir kun du rtag par ni// kun nas mdzes pa nyid yin no// thugs ni kun du yang dag phyir// kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyid// dus min chos dang bral ba'i phyir// sku la sme ba nag spag med// lus 
269b1(mdo 'grel): sogs zo mdog bde ba yis// rgya yi chos ni bstan pa'i phyir// sdug gnyis shing ba la lta bur ni// shin du legs par 'jam pa nyid// dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa yis// phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod nyid/ 
269b2(mdo 'grel): chos zab mo la gnas pa'i phyir// phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid// phyi rjes su ni yang dag par// yongs dag chos ni ston mdzad dang // sems can kun la rtse ba yis// phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid// bslab pa 
269b3(mdo 'grel): rab ma kun ston pas// zhal ni gcang mi ring shid // khams gsum pa ni thams cad kyi// shin tu rab tu gas la bar ni// gzugs brnyan / bur shes pa'i phyir// mchu ni bim bltar dmar nyid/ 
269b4(mdo 'grel): 'jam por spras pas ljags mnyen nyid// yon tan mchog mangs ljags srab nyid// chags pa'i byis pas gting dpag dka'i// chos kyi 'dul bas ljags dmar nyid// bsnyengs pa thams cad mi 
269b5(mdo 'grel): mnga' bas// 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid// shin du stan la sogs gsungs pas// gsung snyan mnyen la 'jam pa nyid// srid pa'i kun sbyor bsdams pa'i phyir// mche ba zlum pa nyid yin no// gdul 
269b6(mdo 'grel): dka'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir// mche ba rno ba nyid yin no// shin du dkar ba'i chos kyis ni// btul phyir mche ba dkar ba nyid// mnyam pa'i sal rab gnas phyir// mche ba rab tu mnyam pa nyid// 
269b7(mdo 'grel): rim pas chos ni nges rtogs shing // gsal bas mche ba byin gyis phra// shes rab mchog la gnas pa'i phyir// shangs ni mtho zhing yid du 'ong // skye 'gro gtsang mabun tshogs pas// shangs ni yang dag 
269b8(mdo 'grel): gtsang ba nyid// chos ni shin du rgya che'i phyir// spyan ni spangs pa nyid yin no// don gyi tshogs ni bsdus pa yis// mchog tu rdzi ma skyugs pa nyid// gzhon nu ma kun mngon mgu bas// spyan ni pad 'dab 
270a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas 'dra nyid// rtag tu phyi rjes gzigs pa'i phyir// de bzhin smin tshugs ring ba nyid// chos 'dul 'jam po la mkhas pas// smin ma shin du 'jam pa nyid// thugs rgyud dge 
270a2(mdo 'grel): bas brlan pa'i phyir// smin ma shin tu snum pa nyid// thams cad du ni skyon gzigs phyir// smin ma'i spu ni mnyam pa nyid// mchog tu gnod pa bzlog mdzad pas// phyag ni ring zhing rgyas pa nyid// 
270a3(mdo 'grel): chags sogs g.yul las nges rgyal bas// snyan gnyis mnyam pa nyid yin no// sems can kun gyi rgyud la ni// rab tu gnod pa spangs pa yis// sgra gas na snyan gyi dbang po ni// nyams pa rnam par 
270a4(mdo 'grel): spangs pa nyid// lta bas byas pa thams cad kyis// gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis// dpral ba legs 'byes rtsod pa kun// zhi byas dbyes ni che ba nyid// smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa yis// 
270a5(mdo 'grel): dbu ni yongs su rgyas pa nyid// 'dod la zhen pa bzlog pa yis// dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag nyid// mthong dang bsgom pa'i spang bya ni// bcom pas dbu skra sdug pa nyid// bstan pa blo ni 'jam po yis// 
270a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su shes pas dbu skra 'jam// dri mas thun ni ma 'khrugs pas// sgra ni ma 'dzings pa nyid do// rtag par tshig rtsub ma brjod pas// skra ni mi gshor ba nyid do// byang chub yan lag me tog ni// 
270a7(mdo 'grel): bkram phyir dbu skra dri zhim nyid// rtag par kun du mdzes par ni// 'gyur ba'i bsod nams nyid kyis ni// dpal be'u dang ni bkra shis mtshan// dpal gyis mdzes pa'i phyag zhabs nyid// 'di dag ni 
270a8(mdo 'grel): mtshan sum du rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la gnas pa'o// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sku bzhi brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// 
270b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i lam 'jug yang dag par// sbyar las bsod nams tshad med gang // de yis 'gro kun rgyal ba yi// lam la legs par 'jug par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni// nam mkha' kun kyab 
270b2(mdo 'grel): skye bo rnams// ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhing // me khom thams cad rnam par spangs// skye bar lha dang me yin// skye ba yongs su thob par shog/ sred pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pas// dkon 
270b3(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // dam chos nyan sems don bsgom dang // sems ni dben par gnas par shog/ theg pa chen po la gnas te// tshangs pa'i spyod dang ldan par shog/ lam kun 
270b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par bsgoms pa yis// sa la sogs pa kun zab nas// ning kun yang dag sbyangs nas su// myur du rgyal ba thob par shog/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas skabs su// bsam pa'i don kun tham 
270b5(mdo 'grel): cad ni// nam mkha'i mdzad bzhin mkha' nyid nas// sems can kun la 'byung ba shog/ phyogs ban+d+ha na pa mkha'i mthar gnas pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni de dag rnams// don grub 'jig rten 
270b6(mdo 'grel): khams bzhin du// de dag thams cad rnam dag shog/ bdag kyang byang chub snying po'i bar// zad zing mi 'jigs dam chos dang // byams pas sems can thams cad kyi// bsam kun yongs 
270b7(mdo 'grel): surdzogs byeng cing // rtag pa nyid du tshangs spyod dang // bram pa kun gyis bsdams par sheg/ sems can da kun byed pa dang // chos kun dan ma nyan pa shag/ 'jig rten khams kyis 
270b8(mdo 'grel): can kun// bdag la gnod pa byed kyang ni// bdag ni de dag thams cad la// phan 'dogs byed pa nyid du shog/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsran nas bdag/ rtag par sems can don la brtson// 
271a1(mdo 'grel): sems ni dam chos bsam gtan la// ro gcig bstan pa nyid du shog/ ji ltar brtson ldan brtson 'grus bzhin// bdag kyang go cha sbyor ba dang // de bzhin mi ldog pa zhes pa'i// 
271a2(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus dang ni ldan par shog/ ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yi// tshogs kyi byang chub bsgrubs pa yis// bsam gtan kun la gcig tu gnas// bdag sems rdo rje lta bur shog/ shes rab nam mkhan/ 
271a3(mdo 'grel): mtha' khyab pa// rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid dang // rab mthug kun dga'i tshogs dang ni// snying rje'i ro yis nges gang zhing // thabs dang smon lam de bzhin du// stobs ni rab tu 'byor pa dang // ye shes 
271a4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid 'di dag ni// bdag la rnam par dag par shog/ mngon shes kun gyi mthar phyin te// khyad par lam ni thob par shog/ sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyangs te// bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid gyur 
271a5(mdo 'grel): cig/ 'di nyid kyi ni rim pa yis// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// 'khor ba pa yi sems can kun// myur du rgyal ba nyid du shog/ bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba 'di// bdag nyid kyi ni blo yis 
271a6(mdo 'grel): byas// kun nas kun du ma lus pa// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pas na// kun du bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i// smon lam rgyal mtsho ji lta ba// de bzhin du ni bdag la yang // dge ba rgya mtsho de myur du/ 
271a7(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang ni bcas par shog/ phyogs bcu nam mkha' kun khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyal rnams gang // de dag ji ltar smon lam ni// mngon du byas pa'i rim pa rnams// de tsam nyid du 
271a8(mdo 'grel): bdag gis kyang // bsam pa brtan pa de bzhin gyi// bsod nams mthu yis 'di dag ni// de bzhin du ni 'grub par shog/ ji ltar dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs kyi// smon lam de ltar bdag gi yang // / 
271b1(mdo 'grel): dus ni yun mi ring ba yis// smon lam 'di ni yongs rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun rnams rang rang gi/ zhing bzhugs mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // mkha' mnyam chos kyi char gyis ni// rtag tu 
271b2(mdo 'grel): sems can par byed shog/ sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas chos// dge 'dun bcas pa thams cad la// lha rdzas mchod sman mtha' yas pas// yang dag par ni mchod byed shog/ de bzhin gshen/ 
271b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i yon tan gyis// 'jigs rten khams kun gang bar shog/ mchog ni chos rnams sems 'gyur ning // srid pa sbyong bar byed par shog/ lung don gang dang 'gal ba dang // don med pa'am yang na ni/ 
271b4(mdo 'grel): gong 'og 'tshal dang sgra ngan ldan// gzhung gi skyon ni cung zad gang // brtse ba can gyis dag byed pa'am// 'on te sgra srur spangs te byas// chos kyi blo tsam gyis byas phyir// mkhas pas bdag la 
271b5(mdo 'grel): bzod par rigs// blo ni zhen par gyur pa dang // so so skye bo yin pa'i phyir// 'dir ni bdag gis skyod bsdus gang // spangs zhing chos dang mthun bzung ste// blo can brtse bas bzod par mdzod// 
271b6(mdo 'grel): 'di rgyal ba'i lal la 'jug pa las rtsen mas kyi la du nyes ma nuba'i// jig bshad pa'i spang byed de// gzung bya thams cad blang bar bya// rtag pa thams cad bsdu bya zhing // chos kyi bdas 
271b7(mdo 'grel): med goms par byas// rang gzhan phyir ni slob dpon ni// sangs rgyas ye shes dpal gyis byas// rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa yi// chos bsdus pa ni rdzogs pa'o// rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug 
271b8(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po rigs pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs shing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // e ma/ rtsom pa'i tshad ldan pa/ 
272a1(mdo 'grel): chen gyis mdzad rgyal ba'i lam 'jug 'di// zhung la gsal rdzogs lung rigs dang 'brel don chen ldan mthong ste// legs sbyar skad kyis dben pa'i mi rnams la ni phan 'dod 
272a2(mdo 'grel): nas// rtsed dus skyes kyang rigs gnas lnga sbyangs sdom gsum la gnas pa'i// bod yul dbus kyi dge slong dgra bcom legs par mnyan te basbyar// phrag dog 'gram khengs dreg sems spangs te/ 
272a3(mdo 'grel): blangs na don chen 'gyur// gang dag srid zhe na blo zhan 'tshe med long med bsgom 'dod sogs// zos bral rnams kyang 'di tsam cig nyan nus na thos mang 'gyur// gzhung 'di'i tshad ni tshigs bcad stong dang // 
272a4(mdo 'grel): gcig brgyas lhag pa ste// sgra don dpyad nas bsgyur kyang nongs na mkhas rnams bzod par bzhes// brtsams zhus bskur ba'i mkhan po gsum gyis 'bad 'bras 'di dar nas// dge des bdag 
272a5(mdo 'grel): sogs 'gro kun rgyal ba'i lam zhugs kun mkhyen shog/ bsgyur ba'i dgos 'brel dang gzhan la gdams pa dang bzod par gsol ba dang bsngo ba la sh+lau ka gsum lots+tsha bas bgyis so// / 
272a6(mdo 'grel): swa pa ra he ta b+ha tu bdag kyang gzhan la phan par shog/ @#// byang chub sems napa'i spyod yul mos su dag pa'i ma na ma dang bsdus pa slob dpon dpal phrag can 'dzin pazang bas mdzad pa bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi saShA go tsA ri 
272a7(mdo 'grel): ba ri shu d+d+hi sU trAR+sha sang gra ha/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' dag 
272a8(mdo 'grel): spyod yul ma yin pa// spyod yul spyod yul min spangs pas// spyod yul thams cad dag gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 'dud// zhing ni yongs su sbyong 'dod pas// rang dang gzhan gyi 
272b1(mdo 'grel): rgyud dag la// byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar yid// sa so'i spyod yul 'gyung bar bya// thog mar gnyid gsad de yi tshe// 'di ltar yid la bya ba ni// bsod napas ye shes mngon 'phel don/ 
272b2(mdo 'grel): 'bad pa med par mkhas gyur cig/ bag med gnyid las rngam grol zhing // skye dgu'i mi shes mtshan mo zad// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi shar bzhin// bla med de mthong ldan par shog/ gnyid yongs 
272b3(mdo 'grel): su gsad pa yi'o// ldang che nyon mongs nyer len gyi// 'khor ba'i gnas mal spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes de ltar// stobs dang brtson sogs bla med shog/ gnas mal las 
272b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su ldang ba'i'o// ngo tsha dang ni khrel yod gos// byams dang snying rje'i gdags ni// sems can thams cad bla med par// rgyal ba ji bzhin gyon gyur cig/ smad g.yogs gyon pa'i'o// 
272b5(mdo 'grel): byams chen dang ni brtse ba'i gos// bde gshegs ji bzhin gyon pa dang // mtha' dag sems can yan lag ni// legs sbas mnyam pa nyid gyur cig/ stod g.yogs gyon pa'i'o// bla med theg 
272b6(mdo 'grel): pa chen por de// rkang pa 'jug par byed gyur cig/ lha yi ba non dang tshangs pa yi// bzhon pa la sogs nges 'byung gi/ rim pas mthar gyis bgrod par shog/ mchil lha mgyon pa'i'o// lus can 
272b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad thams cad du// thams cad bde 'gro myang 'das dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer gnas// sgo chen po ni 'byed par shog/ sgro dbye ba'i ro// khams gsum rmongs pa chen po yi// 
272b8(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i khyim las phyir byung ste// thams cad mkhyen pa gsal 'dod pa// 'jig rten mtha' dag nges 'gro shog/ khang pa las phyir 'byung ba'i'o// mi kho ba ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa las// mtha' dag skye bo 
273a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi sgo// mi dge gang byas byang sems dang // sangs rgyas kyis kyang bcad gyur cig/ sgo 'gegs pa'i'o// bla med de bzhin gshegs pa yi// goms pas thams cad du bgrod 
273a2(mdo 'grel): shog/ 'gro ba'i'o// nyon mongs ngan du spyod pa yi// bshang gci dri ma 'dor gyur cig/ dri ma 'dor ba'i'o// mi gtsang dri mi zhim sogs 'dor// tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri bsal te// rtse dang bya ba dag/ 
273a3(mdo 'grel): pa yi// phyag zhabs sems can ldan gyur cig/ khrus kyi'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas sgor// rnam 'phel bde bar gshegs pa bzhin// kun mkhyen tshul khrims dri zhim dang // ye shes snang ba 'char bar 
273a4(mdo 'grel): shog kha 'khru ba dang so shing za ba'i'o// rtag tu sems can mnyam par ni// na rgas nyon mongs thams cad dang // bral zhing thams cad mtshungs par yang // rdo rje snying po'i lus su shog/ sman nye bar spyod 
273a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i'o// kun nas rab tu dang ba dang // 'dod chags la sogs rdul spangs te// sems can rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin// blta bas mi ngoms srung gur cig/ chag chag dang phyag dang ba sbyang rul gyi'o// 
273a6(mdo 'grel): spyi gtsug 'jig rten mi mthong dang // lha dang mi la sogs rnams kyi// phyag 'os rtag tu sems can kun// rdzogs sangs mchod rten bzhin mchod shog/ mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i'o// skyes bu chen po 
273a7(mdo 'grel): song ge yi// chos 'dzin rdo rje gdan 'dug ste// 'os su gyur pa'i sems can gyi// bdud stobs stobs las rgyal thob shog/ stan dang gding ba'i 'o// kun mkhyen dam chos thams cad kyi// mdzod ni 
273a8(mdo 'grel): 'byed dang 'don pa dang // skye bo rnams kyi bka' lung ni// tshangs dbyangs lta bu thob par shog/ glegs bam 'byed pa dang 'don pa la sogs pa'i 'o// rdul dang nad kyi skyon spangs te// gser gyi mdog

274a8(mdo 'grel): dpal mas kyi rjesa'i steng na bran gra dang bral ba' cheg kyi shrI bzang pa dang / 'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bskur bag/ mas sa ma men pa 
274b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pa ta bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

275b1(mdo 'grel): las bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag mi 'di zhes

275b8(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag mid 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te 
276a1(mdo 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi'o// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de

276a4(mdo 'grel): nams cung zad ci bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ pha ma la sogs pa sems can thams cad dang bdag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// bdag gis bsod 
276a5(mdo 'grel): nams 'dis pha ma la sogs pa sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni sprul lo// ma grol ba rnams ni dkrol lo// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung ngo // yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni// yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o//

276a8(mdo 'grel): khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / shes rab rnam par spyod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la slob pa ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sems can 
276b1(mdo 'grel): thas cad byin dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slang du/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ 'das pa dang / ma'angs pa dang / dbyung byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po/

276b7(mdo 'grel): rgya gang skad du/ bo d+his rnas ma pa ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gang 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' 
276b8(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po rnams su brjod pa ste/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims so// de rnams la slob par 'dod pa'i khyim 
277a1(mdo 'grel): pa'am rab tu byung ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pas/ lhan cig tu chos mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa nus pa/ ngag gi rnam par rig
277a2(mdo 'grel): byed kyi don mdzad pa dang / go bar nus pa'i zhabs dag la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ bdag rigs kyi bu khyod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa 'am/ btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
277a3(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len par 'tshal bas/ de stsal ba la rung zhing / dka' ba ma mchis na/ thang cig bdag la rjes su brtse bas sul cing gson cig ces so// 'di lngar lan gsum gsol ba btab/ 
277a4(mdo 'grel): nas/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rnams na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems 
277a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' rnams la btud nas/ de rnams kyi yon tan rnams mngon sum du byas nas sems dpa' chen po bskyed nas/ pus mo btsugs pa'ams la tsog tsog por 'dug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
277a6(mdo 'grel): mdun du bzhugs su gsol nas mchod de/ mngon sum du byas nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod do// rigs kyi bu'am tshe dang ldan pa 'am btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang / 
277a7(mdo 'grel): dag par blang ba dag la rjes su stsal du gsol zhes so// de nas rtse gcig tu nye bar bzhag nas sems dang ba rjes su bskyed de/ bdag ni da ring por mi thogs par zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod 
277a8(mdo 'grel): nams kyi gter thob par 'gyur ro zhes don 'di nyid bsam zhing cang mi smra bar bya'o// slar yang byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa des/ de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sems ma yengs par 
277b1(mdo 'grel): 'dug pa'am/ 'greng bas 'di skad brjod de/ khyod ming 'di skad ces byabs byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad do 
277b2(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang tshul khrims gang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gyur ba dang 
277b3(mdo 'grel): gang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang / tshul khrims gang dkar phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshu khrims dang bslab pa'i gzhi gang yin pa rnams 
277b4(mdo 'grel): bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang / tshul rtsims gang rnams pa 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / ma 'angs pa 
277b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis skyob par 'gyur ba dang / dmyur byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams daltar slob pa rnams nad dam/ des kyang nod lags so zhes 
277b6(mdo 'grel): dam bcu'o// lan gsum dum// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag 
277b7(mdo 'grel): la dgongs su gsal/ slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gas/ bdag med 'di zhes bgyi bas/ gang cung zad lus dang dag dang yid rnams kyis 
277b8(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ma dang pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la brten nas bskyed pa 'di dang sridapa 
278a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan rnams su bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang bgyid du sprul pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te bsdoms nas/ sangs rgyas 
278a2(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / slob dpon gyi spyan sngar mchog dang gtso bo'i bshags par bgyi'o// shes shing dran pa rab du mi 'chab bo// 'di ltar lan gsum du'o// bdag ming 'di 
278a3(mdo 'grel): skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la nye bar mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can/ thams cad mkhyen pa 
278a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad gzigs pa/ skra'i 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi phyed pa'i sku// bla na med pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o// 
278a5(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o// 
278a6(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi 
278a7(mdo 'grel): mchog la skyabs su mchi'o// 'di ltar lan gsum du'o// bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ gsum la skabs su mchis te/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams 
278a8(mdo 'grel): bsgral ba'i phyir dang / dbyung ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la bzhag pa'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
278b1(mdo 'grel): dang ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas nyid rtags pa dang ldan pa dang / rtogs par gyung pa dang / rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas/ 
278b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad sgrib pa dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa rnams dang / ji ltar chos kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i cho ga das/ 
278b3(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba slob dpon dang nye bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di ltar lan// 
278b4(mdo 'grel): gsu mo// bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa 'di dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dz+nyAn med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
278b5(mdo 'grel): du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// skyabs med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / gling med pa'i 'jig rten la skyabs dang / skyob pa dang / gnas dang 
278b6(mdo 'grel): dpung gnyen dang / gling du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ma skal ba las bskal bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa las yongs sum 'das pa chos kyi dbyings kyim 
278b7(mdo 'grel): ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar gyur cig/ dbugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs 'byin par gyur cig/ 'di ltar lan gsum mo// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di ltar 
278b8(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can gyi khams bza' med pa la ji ltar ma dang pa dang sred mi dang spun dang / dri dang bu ma dang / gzhan gnyen dang sdug gi gnyen mtshams su gyur ba rnams 'di 
279a1(mdo 'grel): ltar so sor bzung bar bgyi'o// gzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang / stobs ji lta ba dang / brten pa ji lta bar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di nas bzung ste/ 
279a2(mdo 'grel): cung zad sbyin pa btang bar bgyi'o// tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o// bzod pa bskyed par bgyi'o// brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/ shes rab
279a3(mdo 'grel): brtan par bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang slob bo// de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ 
279a4(mdo 'grel): las brtsams te/ sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can de rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i 'jug pa'i rjes su mchi'o// 'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag byang chub 
279a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpar dus 'di nas bzung ste/ bdag slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol// 'di ltar lan gsum mo// de nas slob dpon des sku de'i spyan sngar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
279a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' bzhugs shing / 'tsho zhing 'dzin pa dang / gzhes pa rnams la zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas btud de gsol bar bya'o// ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpas bdag ming 'di 
279a7(mdo 'grel): skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye ba las ji srid du lan gsum du yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/ bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems 
279a8(mdo 'grel): dpas/ ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid dbang du gyur par yang dag par shes te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' med pa rnams su 'phags pa'i mchog lkog du gyur// 
279b1(mdo 'grel): kyang / sems can gyi don la lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams la/ 'di byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba la mkhyen par gsol lo// 'di ltar lan gsum mo// 'di ltar yang tshul 
279b2(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i las kyi rjes la/ 'di ni nges par chos nyid yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa la gtugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs/ 
279b3(mdo 'grel): shing 'dzin pa rnams gzhes pa rnams dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ltas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang gis de rnams la 'di lta bur 'gyur ba ste/ 
279b4(mdo 'grel): ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bas ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye ba las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba blangs so zhes so// 
279b5(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar re zhig gzhan yang blang ba'i cho ga brjod pa/ gal te yon tan dang ldan pa gang zag de dang nye bar ma gyur na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdun du rang nyid kyis byang chub 
279b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blang bar bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom 
279b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams dang / sa chen por bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btud par bya ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs pa'am/ tsag tsag pos tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bdag 
279b8(mdo 'grel): meng 'di skad ces bgyi bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sa chen por chub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsol bar bgyi'o// de rnams kyi 
280a1(mdo 'grel): yang spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad blang ba la/ tshul khrims gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 
280a2(mdo 'grel): sngar bzhin no// ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' bdag byang chub sems dpa' 'di nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang bdag bzung du gsol zhes pa ni las so// 
280a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po bla ma su nA ya shrI mi tra dang / zhu chen 
280a4(mdo 'grel): gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#// byang chu gyisams bskyed pa dang mi dang tha pa tshig kyang chub sems dpa' dathams rnam par rgyal bas ma dzang pa ba gas so// rgya gar skad du/ bo d+ha 
280a5(mdo 'grel): tsit+ta ud pa ta sa ma da na bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ni// 'jam mchog mgon la rab bdud 
280a6(mdo 'grel): nas/ byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang // yi dam gsal po bri bar bya// de la dang po re zhig rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rten dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub 
280a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa'i thad du song nas/ dkyil 'khor bya ba sngon du btang ste pus mo// g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu sbubs gsum sngon du 'gro ba 
280a8(mdo 'grel): can gyi byang chub kyi sems bdag la stsol cig ces lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des kyang nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin no zhes khas blang ngo // de nas sa phyogs 
280b1(mdo 'grel): yid du 'ong bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsgyel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ ra mo bzhugs su gsol te/ chu dri zhim pos sku khrus gsol la/ gos dkar bas kyis 
280b2(mdo 'grel): gsagasas sa nas su la sa ng+yas m+b+ha / na pa da das // rnapa da 
280b3(mdo 'grel): dang gdugs// gar dang rol mo glu dbyangs ni// yid 'ong sangs rgyas spyod yul dag/ nam mkha' mtha' dag kun khebs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// zlos sprul nas ni bdag 'bul lo// 
280b4(mdo 'grel): zhes yid kyis mchod pas mchod par mdzad do// mchod par bya ba dang / mchod par byed pa dang / mchod pa rnams rang bzhin gyis dbyer med par dmigs te/ ji ltar 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa// rgyal ba 
280b5(mdo 'grel): rnams la mchod mdza pa// de bzhin bdag gi de bzhin gshegs// mnan pa sras dang bcas rnams mchod// ces sgrub pas mchod par bya'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ 
280b6(mdo 'grel): chos dang tshogs kyi mchog bcas la// zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi// lus bdud nas ni bdag phyag 'tshal zhes lan gsum phyag byas la// rgyal dang de sras rnams la bdag gis ni// bdag gi sa 
280b7(mdo 'grel): kun rnam pa kun du 'bul// sems dpa' mchog rnams bdag ni yongs bzhis shig/ gus pas khyed kyi 'bangs su mche bar bgyi zhes b+ha ba 'dis bdag gi lus sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya// 
280b8(mdo 'grel): de'i rjes la thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas// tshe rabs 'di 'am gzhan dag la// bdag gi ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa'am/ bgyid du stsal pa nyid dang ni// gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te// rjes su yi 
281a1(mdo 'grel): gang bgyis pa// de ni 'gyod pas shin tu yang // 'gyod par bgyis te bdag 'chags kyis// 'dren pa rnams kyi nyes pa la// nyes pa lags par gzung du gsol// 'di ni bzang po ma
281a2(mdo 'grel): lags pas// mgon po slan chad bdag mi bgyid// ces nyes pa thams cad bshags pa byas nas// zag bcas zag pa med pa yi// dge la dga' bas yi rang ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad du// 
281a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la bdag bskul lo// rgyal ba mya ngan 'das bzhed rnams// bskal pa mtha' yas bzhugs su gsol// bdag gis dge kun bltos med par// rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o zhes brjod 
281a4(mdo 'grel): pas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / sangs rgyas la bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin no// de la rang la mngon du phyogs shing 
281a5(mdo 'grel): tsog tsog pur 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas gnas pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad ces brjod cig ces smrar gzhug ste/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems 
281a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' thugs rje chen po can rnams kyang bdag la dgongs su gsol// slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas la sogs pa la mchod pa la sogs pa bgyis pas/ byang chub 
281a7(mdo 'grel): snying por mchis kyi bar// sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi// chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi// tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi// zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o// de'i rjes la/ lus dang / 
281a8(mdo 'grel): de bzhin longs spyod dang // dus gsum gyis ni dge ba rnams// sems can don sgrub bya ba'i phyir// bltos pa med par btang bar bgyi// sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // nam mkha' bzhin du rtag par 
281b1(mdo 'grel): yang // sems can dpag tu med pa yi// rnam mang nyer 'tsho'i bzhir yang shog/ de bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam kun du// thams cad mya ngan 'das par du// 
281b2(mdo 'grel): bdag ni nyer 'tsho'i rgyur yang shog/ mgon po'i spyan sngar rdzogs pa yi// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// sems can de dag thams cad kun// sangs rgyas bde la 'gron du 'bod// ces smon 
281b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid mngon du byas so// de nas/ ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis// byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang // de dag byang chub thugs bsrungs la// dus kun tu ni gnas pa ltar// 
281b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'gro la phan don du// bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed cing // de bzhin du ni rus kun du// bdag gis de ni bsrung bar bgyi zhes lan gsum gyi bar du smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems bzung 
281b5(mdo 'grel): bar bgyi'o// de nas gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba la mos pa bstan po yod na de'i tshe sdom pa sbyin no// ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab bzung ste/ 
281b6(mdo 'grel): de dag byang sems bslab pa la// rim pa bzhin du gnas pa ltar// de bzhin 'gro la phan don du// byang chub sdom pa bzung bgyi zhing // de bzhin bslab pa de dag la// rim pa bzhin du gnas par 
281b7(mdo 'grel): bgyi zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa sbyin no// ltung ba dang ltung ba med pa'i gzugs brnyan yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan par bya'o// de nas langs te dkon 
281b8(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum la phyag btsal nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs te nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du yon phul nas/ de ring bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// mi yi srid pa legs par thob/ 
282a1(mdo 'grel): de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur to// skyon med btsun pa'i rigs 'di la// ji ltar rnyog par mi 'gyur bar// de bzhin da ni rang rigs dang / 
282a2(mdo 'grel): mthun pa'i las ni bdag gis bya// zhes bya bas mjug rgyas par bya'o// rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen med na ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog/ 
282a3(mdo 'grel): la skyabs su 'go ba sngon du song ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga'o// de ltar byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa gzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gnyis po spyod pas yongs 
282a4(mdo 'grel): su rdzogs par byed pa des na spyod pa la mngon par sbyar bar bya'o// de yang rnam pa gsum ste/ las dang po pa la ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ yi dam gyi spyad pa'o// mos pas spyod pa'i// / 
282a5(mdo 'grel): spyod pa can la ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa'o// sa la bzhugs pa la ni sems cad gyi don bya ba nyid gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ sems can ston 
282a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i spyod pa'o// de la las dang po pa'i yi dam gyi spyod pa brjod pa'o// nang par langs te/ oM pra kri te pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHpra kri te pa ri shud d+ho haM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing 
282a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su brtags pa'i chus gdong la sogs pa dag par bya zhing kun du spyod gtsang bas/ sa phyogs yid du 'ong bas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs sam/ ring bsrel dang bcas// 
282a8(mdo 'grel): pa'i mchod rten nam/ thang ka bkram zhing / bar snang la yang phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis dmigs te/ oM a ma le/ be ma le/ ning ma le// 
282b1(mdo 'grel): swa b+ha bshud d+ho swA hA zhes brjod la// chu dri zhim pos sku khrus gsol te/ gos dkar pos phyis nas/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams sngags 'dis dbul lo// oM a badz+ra wa swA hUM/ oM a badz+ra laM ka re/ 
282b2(mdo 'grel): hUM/ des nas mdun du mngon par phyogs te/ bsdud la/ oM badz+ra b+hU ma~M hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa'i char/ oM badz+rod ka hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lci ba dang / chus kun du bzang 
282b3(mdo 'grel): bi'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la/ oM badz+ra re She hUM/ zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor btad nas lag pa bkru'o// de nas dbus nas brtsams te/ dbus nyid kyi mthar thug par me tog sngags 'dis dgram mo// 
282b4(mdo 'grel): oM haM pa hA me ra be swA hA/ dbus su'o// shar dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams su ni/ A~M yaM purba bi de ha ya swA hA/ oM raM dzaM bu d+hi pa ya swA hA/ oM laM ut+ta ra ku ra be swA hA/ oM baM a pa ra go ta pa ri ye swA hA/ me dang
282b5(mdo 'grel): da ba nga gas dag pa rna/ ga sa/ byung gyig nga pa 
282b6(mdo 'grel): su ne/ oM ya ga dza rat+na ya swA hA/ oMr bu ru Sha rat+nA ya swA hA/ oM las+thi rat+na ya swA hA/ oM ba a shwa rat+na ya swA hA/ me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung rnams su ni/ oM ya khwaD+ga rat+na ya swA hA/ oM rA ma Ni rat+na 
282b7(mdo 'grel): ya swA hA/ oM lA ma hA ni rat+na ya swA hA/ oM bA tsakr-i rat+na ya swA hA/ oM hI a d+ho me ra be swA hA/ zhes bya bas yang dbus su bzhag la dbul bar bya'o// de nas/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe nAM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra 
282b8(mdo 'grel): dI bo hUM/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra ni wi d+ya hUM/ zhes byas pas ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang lha bshos dag dbul bar bya'o// de nas/ rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pa yi// 
283a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// kun gyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang // gang du byang chub la reg dang // zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // 
283a2(mdo 'grel): zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang // bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang // 'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang // seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi// gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// steng dang bar dang 'og dag dang // phyogs dang phyogs
283a3(mdo 'grel): mtshams rnams su yang // skur bcas sku ni med pa yi// mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal zhes bya bas lan gsum du phyag byas la 'dug ste/ rten gyi stobs la sogs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i don du phung po gsum pa gdon par
283a4(mdo 'grel): bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang rjes su dran par bya'o// de nas bar snang la rang gi gzhi bdag dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yid kyis dmigs te/ oM A hUM zhes bya bas lan gsum byin gyis brlabs pas bdud 
283a5(mdo 'grel): rtsir gyur par bsam yid kyis de dag nyid la byin nas/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM a d+ya nu ta ban+na tAta oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod pas bdud rtsi des tshim pa rnams rang gi gnas su song bar lta'o// de nas theg pa 
283a6(mdo 'grel): chen po'i mdo lnga dang / de dang rjes su mthun pa dag las mdo gang yang rung ba ci nus kyis bton nas// sdug bsngal ba dang mgon med pa dag la gos dang zas la sogs pa tha na kham gcig tsam tshun chad byin la/ 'khor gsum 
283a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par bsdus nas smon lam 'di skad ces gdab po// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i// sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir// ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyod mdzad pa// bdag 
283a8(mdo 'grel): gi spyod pa'ang de 'drar shog// ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa dang // 'gro ba ji srid gnas kyi bar// de srid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ni// 'joms pas bdag kyang gnas par shog/ bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid// thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams
283b1(mdo 'grel): pham byas te// rga nad 'chi ba'i dpa' klong 'khrugs pa yi// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog/ de nas oM badz+ra muHzhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol te// de nas byang chub 
283b2(mdo 'grel): kyi sems dang bslab pa dran pa sngon du btang nas ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o// zan za ba'i dus su na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma bya'o// oM ha ri te ma hA badz+ra yak+Shi Ni i daM ba ling grih+Na grih+Na k+Shi 
283b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bas 'phrog ma la zan tshangs gnyis sbyin no// oM a gra bir+N+Na a shi b+h+yaHswAhA/ zhes bya bas thog mar za ba rnams la zan tshangs gcig sbyin la ran pa tshod zin par zos nas/ oM uts+tshiSh+Ta par+N+Na 
283b4(mdo 'grel): a shi b+h+yaHswA hA/ zhes bya bas lhag ma za ba rnams la lhag ma sbyin no// gal te nus pa yod na nyi ma phyed dang dgongs ka'i thun dag la yang de bzhin du bya'o// nus pa med pa ni sngar ji skad brjod pa'i 
283b5(mdo 'grel): cho gas dkyil 'khor bskyang nul byas la/ mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba yang byas nas phung po gsum pa bton te smon lam gdab po// de ni yi dam len pa'i cho ga'o// ting nge 'dzin dang sems can mgu 
283b6(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba'i cho ga 'di/ mdo sde dang byang chub spyod 'jug dang bslab pa kun las btus pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dang yi dam gyi// cho ga bdag gis byas pa las/ 
283b7(mdo 'grel): dge ba thob pa gang yin des// 'gro ba byang chub bsten par shog/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal bas 
283b8(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su ma ti kIrti dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
284a1(mdo 'grel): 'ab rgya ba rjes pa tshan mas nag/ rgya gar skad du/ tsi.Ar+b+ba ta sap+pa ra bi d+hi kra ma/ bod skad du/ sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim pa// 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal 
284a2(mdo 'grel): lo/ ngan song thams cad 'jig pa dang // sgrib pa thams cad las grol zhing // rdzogs sangs go 'phang stsol mdzad pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i 
284a3(mdo 'grel): chos/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la yang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yi// sdom pa'i rim pa bri bar bya// de la dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
284a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang / mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 
284a5(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po la bzhugos pa rnams kyis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed pa
284a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang slob dpon gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do// de ltar gsol ba btab nas 
284a7(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog 
284a8(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o// slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du chos rnams 
284b1(mdo 'grel): kyi mchog zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos rnams la skyabs su mchi'o// slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi 
284b2(mdo 'grel): bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o// zhes lan gsum du brjod do// de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba 
284b3(mdo 'grel): khyad par can byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid kyi dmigs te/ phyag btsal ba dang / ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa la sogs
284b4(mdo 'grel): par byas la/ slob dpon mdun du byas de pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa 'am tsog por yang rung bas 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sems bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu rnams na bzhugs pa'i 
284b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// slon dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sbyin pa'i 
284b6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin dang / tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang / bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du rtsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 
284b7(mdo 'grel): ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par
284b8(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
285a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub chen po la sems bskyed par bya'o// sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung 
285a2(mdo 'grel): bar bgyi'o// yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de ltar slob dpon med kyang bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed 
285a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i cho ga 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bsams te/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa byas nas/ gsol ba gdab 
285a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang slob dpon zhes pa'i tshig spangs pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i go rim gong ma bzhin du bya'o// de ltar sems bskyed pa'i gang zag gi byang chub kyi sems spel bar bya ba'i phyir tha na nyid lan 
285a5(mdo 'grel): gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la// byang chub bang du bdag ni skabs su mchi// bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa 'di dag gis// 'gro la pan phyir 
285a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas 'grub par shog ces byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi sems nyams par byed pa'i tshes bzhi las ldog par bya ste/ ba ni gang zhe na/ bla ma dang mchod par 'os pa slu ba dang / 
285a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan 'gyod pa'i gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang / sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni sdang gis tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad la g.yo dang 
285a8(mdo 'grel): sgras spyod pa'o// byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhi la bslab par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang bsams bzhin du brdzun mi smra ba dang / sems can thams cad la 
285b1(mdo 'grel): lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gnas par bya'i g.yo dang sgras ma yin pa dang / sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing phyogs bcur yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par
285b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / sems can 'ga' zhig dge ba la 'god pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la ni ma yin no// khyad par du mngon par shes pa 
285b3(mdo 'grel): myur du thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa'i chos bdun pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'o mdo la bslab par bya'o// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i 
285b4(mdo 'grel): pan yon ni/ sdong po bkod pa'i mdo la sogs pa las shes par bya'o// de la dang por cho ga bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims 
285b5(mdo 'grel): kyi bslab pa la legs par slob par 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
285b6(mdo 'grel): sdom pa 'bogs pa'i sgo nas slob ma rjes su gzung bar nus pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag byas te/ de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ slob dpon khyod las bdag byang chub sems 
285b7(mdo 'grel): dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom par yang dag par blang ba de len par 'tshal gyis/ de la gnod pa ma mchis na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du cung zad cig gsan cing stsal ba'i rigs so zhes de ltar lan gsum 
285b8(mdo 'grel): gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod nyon cig/ khyod 'di ltar sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs 
286a1(mdo 'grel): dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod dam/ de las khyod kyis sems bskyed 
286a2(mdo 'grel): ba brtan pa dang yi dam brtan par bya'o// gzhan yang 'dren pa'i ched du ma yin nam/ gzhan gyi nan gyis len du bcug pa ma yin nam zhes 'dri'o// de'i 'og du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 
286a3(mdo 'grel): lugs su 'am ras bris la sogs pa mdun du bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
286a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad mdun du bsams la// ci nus pa'i phyi'i mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang phyag byas la/ de ma thag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen stan mthon po la 'dug pa la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis 
286a5(mdo 'grel): phyag byas te/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'am tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo spyar nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nod pas 'di ltar bskul bar bya ste/ slob dpon 
286a6(mdo 'grel): gyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa bdag la myur du stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gsum du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bskul nas/ de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
286a7(mdo 'grel): 'dug pa'am langs pa yang rung ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nad pa de dag la 'di skad ces dri ba bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod byang chub sems dpa' yin nam/ byang chub tu smon lam 
286a8(mdo 'grel): btab bam zhes dris pa na/ len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des kyang btab lags so nas khas blang bar bya'o// de nas mi zad pa dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter chen por gyur 
286b1(mdo 'grel): pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro zhes snyam du bsam zhing sems rab tu dang bar gyur pas dga' ba dang bcas
286b2(mdo 'grel): pas cang mi smra bar thal mo sbyar te 'dug par bya'o// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang tshul khrims thams 
286b3(mdo 'grel): cad de/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims mdor bsdus pa slob mgo bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 
286b4(mdo 'grel): slob pa'i gzhi rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims de dag ci bdag las len par 'dod dam zhes slob ma la 'dri bar bya'o// des de ltar len par 'tshal lo zhes khas len par gyur na 
286b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa sbyin par bya ste/ btsun pa'am/ tshe dang ldan pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las/ 'das pa'i 
286b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa dang / ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang 
286b7(mdo 'grel): yin pa dang tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa dang / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims su 
286b8(mdo 'grel): gyur pa gang yin pa'i bslab pa gzhi gang dag dang tshul khrims gang dag la/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bslab par gyur pa dang / ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyis 
287a1(mdo 'grel): slob par gyur pa dang / phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang byang chub sems 
287a2(mdo 'grel): dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad de/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang dge ba chos sdus pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims nod dam zhes smros shig/ des kyang nod lags so zhes 
287a3(mdo 'grel): smros shig/ de ltar slob dpon gyis lan gsum gyi bar du len nam zhes brjod cing slob mas rab tu len lags so zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa blang bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge ba'i bshes
287a4(mdo 'grel): gnyen des/ slob ma la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa byin nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas thal mo sbyar te/ 
287a5(mdo 'grel): 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bas/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag 
287a6(mdo 'grel): par blang bar bya ba lan gsum gyi bar du mnos lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/ bdag ming
287a7(mdo 'grel): 'di zhes bgyi ba dbang du gyur par 'phags pa'i mchog lkog tu gyur kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas gtugs pa'i tshes thams cad lkog du ma gyur pa'i thugs mnga' ba thams
287a8(mdo 'grel): cad la mkhyen par gsol lo zhes lan gsum gyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brjod de/ phyag btsal nas bla ma dang slob ma ldang bar bya'o// 
287b1(mdo 'grel): de nas langs la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa mnos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod
287b2(mdo 'grel): nyon cig/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par len pa'i las brjod pa rdzogs pa de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
287b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
287b4(mdo 'grel): ga ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa mnos so zhes yang dag
287b5(mdo 'grel): par mkhyen par 'gyur ro// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis chos kyi brtse bas bu dang spun zla'i dgongs pa mdzad la de ltar dgongs pa 
287b6(mdo 'grel): mdzad pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// 
287b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di dad pa med pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir dad pa med pa
287b8(mdo 'grel): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa rab tu bstan na/ dad pa med pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la ma dad pas spong bar byed de/ des na ji snyed byang chub sems dpa' 
288a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa la bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ba de snyed kyi bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ma dad pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
288a2(mdo 'grel): gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bsrung bar bya ba yin pas gzhan sdig pa las bzlog par bya ste/ de'i phyir mchog tu dge ba'i byang chub sems 
288a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' gsang bar bya ba yin no// de nas bslab pa'i gzhi pham pa'i gnas su gyur pa sdom pa 'jig pa'i rgyu bstan cing / nyes byas kyi ltung ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa yang/ 
288a4(mdo 'grel): bstan par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdor bsdus pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// 
288a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / zhu chen
288a6(mdo 'grel): gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba lags so// / slad kyi paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// 
288a7(mdo 'grel): nga ba sems du rlom pa nga ga sa dga'ags me zung nas thas pas dpa btsugapa sa// rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi satwa saM pa ra gra ha Na bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga 
288a8(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bla med bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu skye ba yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag bsam shing lden sa bon ni// sdom pa dam pa bskyed cing spel bar byed pa ste// 'bras bu 
288b1(mdo 'grel): mchog des sems can tshogs rnams tshim par byed// 'dir nges par sdom pa gzung ba ni sdom pa 'bogs pa'i cho ga la mkhas shing / len 'dod kyi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i bla mas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod/ 
288b2(mdo 'grel): par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas sam maN+Dal med kyang rung ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
288b3(mdo 'grel): du rkang gnyis mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshogs rnams kyi 
288b4(mdo 'grel): mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de ltar gsum mo// skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen du bdag bzung du gsol lo// de'i rjes su bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di 
288b5(mdo 'grel): nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo // srog gcod pa las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o// de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa las log par g.yem pa dang 
288b6(mdo 'grel): brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o// de ltar gsum mo// deng nas gzung nas bdag mchog gi dge bsnyen du 
288b7(mdo 'grel): gzung du gsol zhes pa'o// de ltar 'di yan lag gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yan lag lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa nyin zhag gcig pa ni/ 
288b8(mdo 'grel): rtag tu mi 'dogs pa'i rgyan bzhag ste/ nyi ma shar ba nas sngar bzhin du gzung ste/ slob bon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid sang gi nyi ma ma shar gyi 
289a1(mdo 'grel): bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo // srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o// de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i// 
289a2(mdo 'grel): chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas dang / khri stan mthon po dang / mal stan chen po dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / kha dog 'chang ba dang / gar dang glu dang // 
289a3(mdo 'grel): rol mo'i sgra dang / ltad mo blta ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o// dgra bcom pa yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan nas bzhugs pa bzhin bgyi'o// bdag gso sbyong gi 
289a4(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di yang sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / ma thob pa'i don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur 
289a5(mdo 'grel): cig/ de ltar gsum mo// de ltar 'di ni bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa'i sdom pa ste 'phags pa rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// nyin par tsam yang dag par len pa la dus 'di nas bzung 
289a6(mdo 'grel): ste ji srid nyi ma nub kyi bar du zhes brjod par bya'o// mtshan mo tsam la ni dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du zhes brjod par bya'o// gso sbyong gi sdom pa kho na ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
289a7(mdo 'grel): du len pa ni go mo'i sdom pa ste// de blang ba ni dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhes brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa don du gnyer bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
289a8(mdo 'grel): gzugs mdun du byas nas mchod pa byas te/ de'i mdun du dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chu 
289b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' rnams la rab tu dang ba yang dag par bskyed nas phyag byas te/ pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pa'am tsog tsog por yang rung bas thal mo sbar te mdun du 'dug nas bla ma la gsol ba 
289b2(mdo 'grel): gdab par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdag khyod las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa de la spro yis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thugs/ 
289b3(mdo 'grel): brtse ba'i slad du gsol zhes de ltar gsum mo// bla ma des 'di ltar brjod de/ khyed kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab bam/ bdag las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa 
289b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin par 'dod dam zhes pa yang gsum mo// des kyang 'dzin par 'tshal lo zhes dam bca' bar bya'o// bla ma las 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham 
289b5(mdo 'grel): na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas lus 
289b6(mdo 'grel): dang ngag dang yid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ma dang pha dang sems can gzhan la brten nas skye ba 'di dang gzhan rnams su sdig pa'i las gang cung zhig bgyis par gyur pa dang 
289b7(mdo 'grel): bgyid du stsal ba dang rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi'o// shes shing dran pas mi 'chab bo zhes lan gsum mo// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung ste/ snying po 
289b8(mdo 'grel): byang chub la mchis kyi bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mkhyen pa thams cad ston pa 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi 
290a1(mdo 'grel): phyed pa'i sku tha na med pa'i sku la skyabs su mchi'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog zhi ba'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o// tshogs rnams kyi mchog phyir mi ldog pa'i 
290a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum mo// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral 
290a3(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir dang / gdon par bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir dang / thams cad pakhyed pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar 'das 
290a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang da ltar dang ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub tu sems bskyed de sangs rgyas pa dang 'tshang rgya ba dang 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/ ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrib pa med 
290a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyed cing gzigs pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen cing rjes su mkhyen pa'i cho ga des/ bdag ming 'di zhes 
290a6(mdo 'grel): bgyi bas slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdun du/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes 
290a7(mdo 'grel): lan gsum mo// bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsupa la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang bla na med pa yang dag par
290a8(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten na skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / gling med pa rnams kyi 
290b1(mdo 'grel): skyobs pa dang / skyabs dang gnas dang / dpung gnyen dang / gling du 'gyur bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las margal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / yongs su mi ldog
290b2(mdo 'grel): po'i sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi ba dang / dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo// bdag
290b3(mdo 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi bas de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams la ji ltar ma dang pha dang sring mo dang spun zla dang bu dang bu mo dang // gzhan yang nye du dang snag gi gnyen 
290b4(mdo 'grel): mtshams su gnas pa de ltar rab tu gzung ngo // rab tu bzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang stobs ji lta ba dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di nas 
290b5(mdo 'grel): gang cung zhig sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyung ba dang / tshul khrims srung bar 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa bsgom par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan 
290b6(mdo 'grel): la sems mnyam par 'dzem par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba dang / thabs mkhas pa la slob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la
290b7(mdo 'grel): phan pa dang bde ba'i don du'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag 
290b8(mdo 'grel): par 'jug par byed pa des byang chub sems dpa' ba dag slob pas 'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems dpar slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes lan gsum mo// 'di dag thams 
291a1(mdo 'grel): cang byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba 
291a2(mdo 'grel): 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs so zhes bya'o// de 'dra ba'i bla ma yang med na rang gis yang dag par blang bar bya ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba dang / 
291a3(mdo 'grel): slob dpon med 'di zhes bgyi ba bzhag nas/ 'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpas gzung du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par
291a4(mdo 'grel): bya'o// de ltar mkhyen par gsol ba'i mthar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa dang / rtag tu 'di'i dge ba mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub 
291a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i sde snod las gsungs pa'i cho ga bsdus pa'o// gzhung 'di'i bsod nams bdud rtsi yis// sems can yongs su tshim byas te// mkhas pa 'jig pa med pa ni// kun rig dpag/ 
291a6(mdo 'grel): bsam go 'phang shog/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas sdus pa'i sdom pa bzung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// / kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang 
291a7(mdo 'grel): chag lo tsA ba dge slong dgra bcom gyis bsgyur ba'o// @#mas na pa // rgya gar skad du/ tri sha ra Na sap+ta ti/ bod skad du/ gsum la 
291a8(mdo 'grel): skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dge bsnyen gsum la skyabs 'gro ba// de ni sdom brgyad rtsa ba yin// sangs rgyas de'i chos dge 'dun 
291b1(mdo 'grel): ni// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs// dus gsum lam las nges grol zhing // shes bya la ni blo rnam rgyal// rmongs pa'i zum pa bcom pas na// sangs rgyas pad+ma ltar rnam rgyas// thog/ 
291b2(mdo 'grel): mtha' med pa'i srid pa ru// ma rig gnyid kyis log pa yi// 'gro la gang gang snang de de// brdzun te rmi lam lta bur 'dod// ma rig gnyid ni rgyun chad cing // yang dag ye shes res 'byung 
291b3(mdo 'grel): bas/ gang zhig rnams sad de sangs rgyas// skyes bu gnyid sangs ji bzhin no// yang dag de nyid ston mdzad cing // mi mkhas sems can rtogs mdzad pas// des kyang sangs 
291b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas sangs rgyas dang // de yang sangs rgyas dang mtshungs 'dod// ye she bla na med pa yis// yang na de nyid thugs chung ba'am// zhi ba nyid kyis rtogs sangs rgyas// de bas 
291b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas 'dod// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs kyi sku// mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis 'bar// 'gro ba rang gi mos pa yi// dbang gi sna tshogs skur 'dzin gang // 
291b6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams tshogs ni tshad med las// 'khrungs pa de ni rgyal ba'i sras// sa bcu la ni gnas rnams kyis// mthong bar gyur pa sku de yis// chos kyi rdzogs longs spyod 'di ni// / 
291b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal sras rnams ni spyod pa yin// rgyal ba sku de la bzhug nas// bla med byang chub thugs su chud// ye shes spros pa med pa gang // shes bya skye med pa las byung // sangs rgyas 
291b8(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi chos skud// ye shes tshogs las byung ba ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// stobs dang ldan pa bco brgyad dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sogs kyis// 
292a1(mdo 'grel): ye shes de ni yang dag brgyan// ngo bo nyid ni chu rkyen las// 'byung bar 'gyur ba rigs min te// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ni// rang bzhin bcos ma yin par 
292a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid ni bcos ma ru// ji ltar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// bcos mam yin ngo bo ni// gzhan la bltos pa yod ma yin// chos rnams nyid kyi ngo bo ni// thams cad 
292a3(mdo 'grel): yod pa ma yin te// de phyir skad cig gcig gis ni// bde gshegs thams cad mkhyen par 'dod// ma rigs nyon mongs can byas rtog/ rang gi ngo bo sgro btags 'dod// byis 
292a4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i rgyu// de rtogs gyur pa log shes yin// ma rig nyon mongs med yod pas// rnam pa kun mkhyen spangs pa nyid// slob ma rang sangs rgyas dag gis// byang chub/ 
292a5(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa yin// rgyal bas dngos po de rnams ni// gzugs rnyan dang yang 'dra mkhyen pas// gnyis med ye shes ma rig zang// shes bya skye med par rab gyi// de bas doni/ 
292a6(mdo 'grel): cung zad kyang // mi mkhyen ci yang ston mi mdzad// sangs rgyas nam mkha' ji bzhin du// de ltar chos nyid la rab bzhugs// yid bzhin nor bu ci yang ni// mi 'byed rtog pa med na yang // 
292a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin du// tshim par byed pa yin par bshad// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rin chen ni// rang gi pos bzhin dgangs mdzad pas// 'gro ba'i bya ba de dang ni// de bzhin 
292a8(mdo 'grel): mdzad par go ba yin// de yi phyir na 'phags pa rnams// bsam mi khyab pa'i rkyen las 'khrungs// yid bzhin nor bu'i bya ba ni// mthong la 'thad pa yod ma yin// chos rnams 
292b1(mdo 'grel): dwangs med nyid ma ni// zla gnas sangs rgyas yin par bshad// 'gayan gzhams sa khang drun// yang dag mngan sum sa dab 'ad// sangs rgyas rnag pa mi mnga' ba'i// gzug+sas 
292b2(mdo 'grel): kyi skung ni yang dag 'byung // sprul pa'i sras nas steng du'ang // yang dag byang chub sten pa ma dang // thub dbang rnams kyi sngags ma ste// chos dang langs spyad rdzogs sprul pa// 
292b3(mdo 'grel): mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa 'di// gu saM bas bral bzhag par gyis// sngon med pa las sbyar byung zhing // byung nas kyang ni yang dag med// dang gang po 'dzin pas chos/
