292b7(mdo 'grel): rgyud las skyes gyu bas// des ni mngon sum dag tu gzigs// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa bzhi// rtogs te shes nas dang gyur pas// skyes bu gang zag zung 
292b8(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa// mi phyed dge 'dun zhes bshad// nyon mongs gzhom phyir slob pas na// gang zag bdun ni slob pa yin// nyes pa ma lus zad pa'i phyir// brgyad pa mi 
293a1(mdo 'grel): slob par bshad do// de rnams 'bras bur gnas pa bzhi// bzhi ni zhugs pa po yin la// ston pa'i slob ma'i tshogs 'di ni// grol dang grol 
293a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i lam la gnas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni// bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang // gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pa// de phyir dge 'dun zhes bshad do// 
293a3(mdo 'grel): thub dbang gi ni sku gsum dang // mya ngan 'das dang gang zag brgyad// sdom brtson bcas la mos pa yis// gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro ba// dge bsnyen du ni dam 
293a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pas// skyabs ni gsum po bsrung bar bya// mu stegs kun la gus pa yis// mchod dang phyag 'tshal mi bya'o// rten gyi dam pa blang nas ni// slar yang dman la
293a5(mdo 'grel): brten gyur na// nyes byas phyogs la gnas pa'i phyir// de ni dam pa'i bzhad gang 'gyur// gang zhig 'phags lam ma skyes pa'i// byis rmongs so so'i skye bo dag/ de ni slob 
293a6(mdo 'grel): dang mi slob pa// min zhes bstan bcos las bshad do// ji ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa// nyer bzung 'khor lor btags pa ni// yang dag gzhan du rnam dpyad pas// 
293a7(mdo 'grel): rnam pa kun du mi dmigs so// de bzhin phung po nas brtsams te// sems can du ni btags pa yang // yang dag gzhan du dpyad byas pas// ci nas kyang ni dmigs mi 'gyur// 
293a8(mdo 'grel): de 'dir thar pa'i cha nas ni// brtsams te rtag tu dge ba la// nyan thos nyid phyir 'bad na ni// rim gyis nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig rang byung ye shes 'dod// rang 
293b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal byang chub don gnyer bas// tshul ba de yang rang rgyal gyis// byang chub khon des 'thab ga// rang ngan la gnal 'dadag ni// snying rje char pa dang bral bas// rang rgyal rgyal bar 
293b2(mdo 'grel): gsung las skyes// thug pa chen por mi bsngags so// rnal ba'i yan tan mtha' yas pa// theg pa tshalas gsungs pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i mthuzas nas/ 
293b3(mdo 'grel): des ni sa 'a 'byung ba yin// des ni theg pa chen pa gad // ma lasu nga gi las kyi bzegs// byang chub sems pa da du// skyes zung dul ban 'du gnas/ 
293b4(mdo 'grel): dag nga ba skyeg pa // mau kyis kyang chu sa pas/ ba pa dag ra/ sa pa' shes/ de da pas myed 
293b5(mdo 'grel): 'od kyang snyi gas ma skyes pa ni// de dag la yang ming mang kyi// zag pa med pa'i dbyings na 'dzad// prI shes na na mangs med skad myer// b+h+yas ni sangs rgyas kyis bskal bas/

294a1(mdo 'grel): bzlog par bshad// shA ri'i lung las dgra bcom pas// byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas nyid// 'di dag dkon mchog gsum gzhan min/ 
294a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas khongs su gtugs par 'dod// ji ltar dgra bcom zad ye shes// sa bdun mngon du 'gro ba can// de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas ye shes// sa bcu sngon du

294a4(mdo 'grel): dang zhugs pa ni// 'phags pa'i lam gyis rab bye ba'i// slob pa rnams kyis bdun ni// mngon pa'i chos las ji skad bshad// de bzhin sde snod rgyas pa las// sa bcu'i

294a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa yin// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs kyi// nges pa der ni yod ma yin// 'phags pa nub kyi rir bshad dang // shar gyi ri ba'i nyan thos kyis// byang chub 
294a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i dbang byas pa// sde sna du bdun du bshad pa yin// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang // de bzhin rig 'dzin zhes bya dang // mad kyi chos mngon 'dul ba dang / 
294a8(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang de bzhin skyes pa'i rabs// de ltar sde snod bdun po ni// lung ni gnyis las bstan pa yin// gang la de ni tshad min 'gyur// de ni dgra bcom spangs pa nyid // 
294b1(mdo 'grel): shes bya mtha' yas dbang gis na// 'khor ba na ni skad cig yod// gal te re re'i dbye bas ring // de bzhin 'di yang srid mtshungs 'gyur// bya ba rgya chen byed pa'i phyir// srid pa// / 
294b2(mdo 'grel): 'ang mnyam mi sems so// bsod nams ye shes stobs kyis ni// lus sems sdug bsngal gyis mi non// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa' smad mi/ 
294b3(mdo 'grel): bya// khams gsum par gtogs nyon mongs zad// byang chub kyi ni snod gyur nyid// phung po khams dang skye mched rngams// gzugs brnyan mtshungs par mthong bas na// 
294b4(mdo 'grel): nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dag ni// stong ni gnyis dang gsum po mthong // rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par bshad// rgyal bsalam gyi

300b8(mdo 'grel): thob 'gyur te// gzugs sogs dngos bral mthar phyir ro// chu 'dra'i phyir la gzung don med// de med der 'dzin yod ma yin// rnam rig tsam de shes de yang // gdod nas ma skyes de 
301a1(mdo 'grel): bdag med/ brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phen// shes rab dman pas mya ngan 'da'// de byir phan tshun mnyam ldan pas// rgyal bas bla med lam du gsungs// 
301a2(mdo 'grel): the gu las sbrul 'dir bsal med// the ga'ang gsar gzhag ci yang med// mar mes theg yang dag mthong // de mthong 'jigs pa rnam par spangs// 'di la bsal bya ci yang med// 
301a3(mdo 'grel): bzhag par bye ba'ang cung zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta// yang dag mthong nas rnam grol bshad// 'di dag dman par bsgoms na ni// 'phags lam byang chub dman nyid 'thang/ 
301a4(mdo 'grel): bsams sogs yang ni dman nyid kyis// bdag tu lta ba spong bar byed// rgya chen 'gro ba'i don bsgrub pas// byang chub sems dpa' zhing kho nas// sku gsum byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// 
301a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gis 'di bsdus bsod nams ni// bskrun gyur gang des skye bo kun// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas// 'gro la phan bde sbyin par shog/ dge slong shAkya'i dpal bzang 
301a6(mdo 'grel): ming // bdag kyang gdul bya lhan cig tu// byams mgon 'phags pa'i zhabs par drung // skyes nas de dgongs gsal byed shog/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa de kho na nyid 
301a7(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa// dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po// mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par yongs su grags pa'i kha che shAkya shrI bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
301a8(mdo 'grel): paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang lo ts+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal ldan gyis rgyang ro sa lu'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// // dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i lam// mdor bsdus rim pa legs 
301b1(mdo 'grel): mnyan pa'i// bsod nams bdag gis gang bsgrub des// 'gro kun bde gshegs myur thob shog/ lnga rig brtul zhugs dri med rnamathar dang // bstan pa'i snying po bsgrub pa lhur 
301b2(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa// nyi 'og khams na mtshungs med gcig pu de'i// gsung 'di phyogs su ni ltang rgyas gyur cig// @#// pa sa na ga shi cha nas so// pha rol tu 
301b3(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oMn mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa nA ya pra bA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya 
301b4(mdo 'grel): anate samyar+g+haM bAd+d+hA ya~M/ taHthA/ oM s+yASh+Tas Te/ sam sa ma ya~M/ shan+te d+ha ne// a sa pA ra paM/ an la b+he/ tar T+Te/ ya na/ la ti/ mahA tedza/ ni dkul/ ni rab Ne/ sarba prAH 
301b5(mdo 'grel): a d+hiSh+Tha na ad+hiSh+Ti te swAhA/ gzungs 'dis 'dzem pa'i gong bu'am bye ma'i gong bul lar nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la mchod rter bya'o// mching rten de la rdul phra rab kyi grangs ji snyed yod pa 
301b6(mdo 'grel): de snyed kyi mchod rten bye ba byas par 'gyur ro// rdul phra rab grangs ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa na 
301b7(mdo 'grel): skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// dang por 'jim pa brdung ba bdag gam gzhan yang 
301b8(mdo 'grel): rung bas byams pa dang snying rjes byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing brdung ngo // de nas 'bi 'bi byin gyis brlab pa// 'og min nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal// 
302a1(mdo 'grel): po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa la phrag btsal bar bsam zhing / sngags kyi grangs gong ma bzhin du 
302a2(mdo 'grel): brjodan// de nas brten 'khyil hU~M thugs bzlas shing gang cag// denas 'bru'am me dgas bden 'brel gyi sngags lan gsul lam bdu ba zlas pa dbral la// de nas/ bam / 
302a3(mdo 'grel): nams 'dri yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid// thob nas rnas pa'i dgra rnams par byas te/ rgan 'chi ba'i dnga' klong 'khrugs pa yi// srid pa'i mtsho las 'greb 'don pad+ma 
302a4(mdo 'grel): ces sngon lam gdab bo// pha ral tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gang ba pa'i chog/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpa la mar me ma legs kyi zhal ldanas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

302a7(mdo 'grel): slob ma la drang ba dang yid ches pa dang 'dod pa'i dad pa skyes la/ de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon brjod la sprob bskyed par b+ha'o// de nas gnas khang khyad par can du 
302a8(mdo 'grel): mchod pa'i tshogs khyad par can bshams la/ 'phags pa'i tshogs spyan drangs te/ phyag btsal ba dang / zhabs bsil zhing gdan 'bul ba dang / bla ra yod pa dang 
302b1(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis legs par mchod cing / mchod pa'i sprin gyi sngags kyang lan gsum brjod do// stod pa byed pas bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan khyad par/ 
302b2(mdo 'grel): can dran pa'i sgo nas gus pas bstod cing / de dang de 'phel ba'i tshig kyang brjod do// de nas bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang
302b3(mdo 'grel): bsngo ba la sogs pa bya ste/ de nas slob ma dad pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis legs par bskyed 
302b4(mdo 'grel): la/ de dag gi rang gi ngo bo dang / dbye ba dang / khyad par yang brjod do// de nas byang chub kyi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi la
302b5(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / bslab pa'i go rim dang / nyams pa dang ma nyams pa'i skyon yin dang / tshul ji ltar bslab pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par 
302b6(mdo 'grel): bstan par bya'o// de yang bag yod pa dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pas zin par bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o// de dag gi mtshan nyid dang / go rim dang / nyams pa dang ma 
302b7(mdo 'grel): nyams pa'i skyon yon la sogs pa yang bslab par bya'o// de dag byed pa la yang brtson 'grus drag pos bskyed la ji mi snyam pa dang / sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / 
302b8(mdo 'grel): ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin med par shes par byas la/ bslab pa gsum ma maM/ shes rab rnam pa gsum la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / spyod lam gyi 
303a1(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o// mthar smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces kyang brjod par bya'o// 'di ni slob dpon gyis 
303a2(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i las kyi go rim mo// slob mas kyang tshul ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bslab par bya'o// 'di ni mtshan nyid theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang / bslab pa bstan pa'i 
303a3(mdo 'grel): tshul lamago rim che long tsam bstan pa yin no// rgyas par ni gzhan nas shes par bya'o// bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad 
303a4(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / @#// rdzam pag dub rgya pa pa bag// rgya gar skad du/ tri saM ba ra kra ma/ bod skad du/ sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa/ dkon mchog 
303a5(mdo 'grel): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa slob pa la/ bsnyen gnas dbog pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang 
303a6(mdo 'grel): por bya'o// bsnyen gnas dpog pa ni/ btsun pa'am/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag dge bsnyen mang 'di zhes bgyi bas/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du 
303a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o// de ltar btsun pas bdag la gsum la skyabs su song bar bzung du gsol
303a8(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o// btsun pa'am slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid song nyi ma shar gyi bar du/ srog 
303b1(mdo 'grel): chags so cog gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / myos byed 'thung ba dang / dus ma yin par za ba dang / phreng ba dang

303b3(mdo 'grel): 'jog go zhes bya ba ni bsnyen gnas dbog pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa brjod cing / bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid

303b8(mdo 'grel): pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slab pa// rjes su bsgrub pa// rjes su bgyid do// gzhan yang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ ma byin par len 
304a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / btses pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ ma

304b1(mdo 'grel): byin pa dang / sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du/ byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gi de ring

305a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi cho ga/ phyag btsal ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun gyi tshul du mchod pa rnams

307a5(mdo 'grel): de rang 'du na dan/ baN+Di bye par gnas sa paH/ rnams kyang ma spyad 'bru 'byur ces/ bdag ngan bdag gis bsgrub pa 
307a6(mdo 'grel): 'das ni 'jigs pa da/ 'jigs das ngadus ba sgya me/ nga dkyilas gzhu byu bye 
307a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'du// snron chud pa myong ba de mug / gang byung de la snang ba med/ se mthil masgra 'bras bsdus// da ni bla mra'i bka' bsgyu 
307a8(mdo 'grel): rigs// ji skar chags spyad yul gang snang rdul sras spyad tshayul dus dab de med bsam/ des de ltar mnyam 
307b1(mdo 'grel): nyid 'gro'ang med gnas nas// sems can dan brnyan chags gnyis 'du byed mkhas par 'gyur/ gson na rgyardza ba thal pa'/ pa \u0f7f 
307b2(mdo 'grel): la yang shin tute/ gcig pung gar 'gro des med de/ thams cad slu ba'i chos can nyid/ bdag gis bdag don ma bsams na/ 
307b3(mdo 'grel): nyin mtshan don med 'da' bar zad// mi dge spyad pas sdug bsngal 'byung // de bas bag yod brtson par rigs// 
307b4(mdo 'grel): mthab zab na dga' snyam sems/ thub nas rbad zad ces kya / mi spyan 'ang chog shes med/ chog shes gang rmed 
307b5(mdo 'grel): dbul po yin/ dbul bas 'byor ba'i chog mi shes/ b+hag brgyal pas chog mi shes/ rgyal ba lA rmi 
307b6(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug 'dod/ des kyang mi chog brgya stong 'dod/ gos mid chen gas 'ad de/ gos thob gos zas mang po 'di/ 
307b7(mdo 'grel): des kyang mi chog de bzhin du// rgyal yul sogs kyi gos gzhan tshol/ nor med chen nor 'dod de/ 
307b8(mdo 'grel): gcig gis mi chag khri zag cel/ de rnyed na yang bdu shar/ rta grang gser ri la sogs 'ad/ gcig thab brgya 'dod pa 
308a1(mdo 'grel): rnyed na// stong 'dad de yi mi chogs// gnyis 'gyur de bzhin sum 'gyur dang / brgya 'gyur la 
308a2(mdo 'grel): sogs 'dod pa mched/ de phyir gang la chog shes yod/ de la nor rnams thams cad yod/ gang la de med thams cad med/ 
308a3(mdo 'grel): thug pa dbul ba'i khyad par ci/ dbul ga nang zad dngas pos phongs/ cung zad zaban 'ang che thob sems/ phyug pa chag med ma 
308a4(mdo 'grel): d+hA d+hA d+ha dang mas// srid la yid skyengs 'thung rtog/ bdag 'du la sangs rgyas bstan pa'i thoga'achi bdag ma bzad dam pa'/ 
308a5(mdo 'grel): pha rol don shes rnyed pa'i mchogabag byed khyil yod chos 'dul yin// rang blo rang skyong lhag pa'i sems// byi na 
308a6(mdo 'grel): stong shes shes rab ste// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sgrol ba'i// bstan rtsa bslab pa bsrung 'dud pas// 'bad pas kun gyis sems bsrung / 
308a7(mdo 'grel): bslab pa ma bsrungs lus don ci// sems ma bsrungs na chos don med// rang sems rang gis bsrung 'dod na// gsung bral mtshan ma med pa smra 
308a8(mdo 'grel): bya/ sprul pa lta bu'i dran pa yis// thams cad 'bad de bsrung bar gyis// bdag gi mnyam nyid rang bzhin te/ yang dag don shes bsrung ba'i/ 
308b1(mdo 'grel): mchog/ gang gi lus sems sgyu 'drar ni// gnas nas yang yang mnyam gzhag bya// sdig byas 'bras bu rnam gsum ste// sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun 
308b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'bab// sna tshogs 'jigs pa char bzhin te// mi 'dod nyi so grib 'dra'o// yid 'ong tho ba dang dge rgyun 'phel// gang dge 
308b3(mdo 'grel): gags 'gro mdun stong dang // de dang der song 'dod dgu gsum// 'di dag bsod nams mchod 'os 'bras// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas chos rje 
308b4(mdo 'grel): shAkya shrIs yul 'khor so sor byon pa'i tshe zhu ba po rnams kyi skal ba dang sbyar te zhar byung du brtsams shing gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa kha 'thor ba rnams rdzogs s+ho// 
308b5(mdo 'grel): dpal sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i ma hA paN+Di ta de nyid dang // / lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
